${ModID}:GennGreymaneQuest.TITLE: Genn Greymane
${ModID}:GennGreymaneQuest.DESCRIPTION: Build your deck with at least #b7 even/X-cost cards and no odd-cost cards (excluding starter cards). NL While you have no odd-cost cards, card rewards include at least one even/X-cost card.
${ModID}:GennGreymaneQuest.AUTHOR: snumodder

${ModID}:GaronaHalforcenQuest.TITLE: Garona Halforcen
${ModID}:GaronaHalforcenQuest.DESCRIPTION: Obtain #yQuestbound #yKing #yLlane. NL Prevent it from exhausting for #b3 combats.
${ModID}:GaronaHalforcenQuest.AUTHOR: snumodder

${ModID}:ZilliaxDeluxe3000Quest.TITLE: Zilliax Deluxe 3000
${ModID}:ZilliaxDeluxe3000Quest.DESCRIPTION: A random Module monster appears with the enemies. NL Obtain #b2 different Modules from extra Module card rewards.
${ModID}:ZilliaxDeluxe3000Quest.AUTHOR: snumodder

${ModID}:BattleAtTheEndTimeQuest.TITLE: Battle at the End Time
${ModID}:BattleAtTheEndTimeQuest.DESCRIPTION: Empty all Potion slots. NL After having #b2 or more Potions at the same time, empty all Potion slots again.
${ModID}:BattleAtTheEndTimeQuest.AUTHOR: snumodder
